summary: All previously identified issues were fixed correctly with no new blocking problems introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: LRU eviction not actually LRU due to lack of access reordering
previous_issues_status.notes: Entry is now touched by delete+set on access to maintain LRU order.
Constructor now validates all config values are > 0 and throws on invalid.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Negative elapsed time on clock drift causing negative refill behavior
previous_issues_status.notes: Elapsed time is clamped to >= 0 before refill calculation.
